title: Juan Rabuffetti - Data Engineer
presentation: I'M A DATA SCIENTIST FROM BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA
presentation2: I am Juan Rabuffetti, currently working as a Data Engineer in AAK Tele-Science, INC.
projectinfo1:
Role: Data Engineer
With the work group, we took on the role of a company consulted about the possibility of creating a fleet of electric taxis in New York.
projectinfo2:
Role: Data Analyst
The objective was to generate information that could enable authorities to take measures to reduce fatalities in traffic accidents.
projectinfo3:
Role: Data Engineer and Scientist
The goal was to deploy a functional API that allows efficient data access, including a recommendation system.
projectinfo4:
Role: Data Analyst
The objective was to analyze the video game market in order to identify possible niches where new products can be developed.
contact-header: Interested in working together? Let's talk!
